title: You Are Special
description: Tremendous potentials lie within us all. However, for different reasons, many are not aware of the latent greatness they possess. This book challenges readers to realize the fact that they are special. It presses on, urging us to give expression to the greatness that lies latent within us. The author does this by exploring the nature, characteristics and abilities of our human make up; Spirit, Soul and Body. By drawing salient points from everyday experiences and biblical stories, the author successfully passes on the message that "we are all special" in a creative, interesting and humorous way. This not only produces a transforming effect on the reader but also allows for an enjoyable read. This book is guaranteed to awaken you to the miracle that you are by showing you that 1) Your body is special 2) Your soul is special 3) Your spirit is special Finally, it shows you how to give expression to the specialty of you spirit, soul and body.
author: Ayodeji A. Majekodunmi
